Posts.EditableText:
.I've been in the process of making a text-based comedy adventure game and I would love for some of you guys to test it out. Controls are pretty straight forward, type shit that you want to do and hope that it works. I would advise reading EVERYTHING and looking at every object you can (you can also try using other senses).

I am really trying to get feedback about what you enjoyed doing, what you tried but failed to do, what disappointed you, what you would improve, etc. Anyone can play, but if you get offended easily then this game will likely piss you off. Other than that, enjoy guys!

LINK

http://play2.textadventures.co.uk/Play.aspx?id=mhhtavvgq0uf7lmcmwmw6w

Alright, you have a decent game it looks like.

I did look around. Then everything else I tried did not work, then I tried help, and then I quit.
